sentence.Network_en: Which brand of toothpaste do you use?

so young children should be carefully supervised when they brush their teeth . and only a smaller small amount of fluoride fluoridated toothpaste , the size a green pea , should be used .所以，幼儿在刷牙时需要细心的指导，并且含氟牙膏的使用量也只能有绿豆般大小。

entry.def: Toothpaste is a thick substance which you put on your toothbrush and use to clean your teeth.
